results.1-1: Companionship. No one has excavated a mine alone. Only by working together can we accomplish great things.
results.2-2: Patience. I don’t get frustrated easily. I’ve dug enough mine shafts that led to nothing to know that not every attempt will lead to success.
results.3-3: Hard Work. I don’t look for shortcuts. I do the job right the first time.
results.4-4: Never Quit. I’ve seen dwarven miners smash through the hardest stone. If they can do it, then so can I!
results.5-5: Sacrifice. Some must suffer so that others may thrive.
results.6-6: Improvement. The most beautiful diamonds require the steady hand of a jeweler to make it shine.

results.1-1: I will return to mines a hero and prove everyone wrong.
results.2-2: I’ve seen too many people die, and I won’t let another companion die because of my inaction.
results.3-3: I will get revenge on the foreman who caused my brother’s death!
results.4-4: I’ve seen horrors in the deep mines, and someone has to protect the rest of the world from them.
results.5-5: I have debts that I can never repay, but I’ll do my best!
results.6-6: I will always stand against tyranny whether it’s a slave trader or a king!

Hallucinogenic Visions (Mushroom Domain).name: Hallucinogenic Visions (Mushroom Domain)
Hallucinogenic Visions (Mushroom Domain).description: Hallucinogenic Visions table for the Hallucinogenic Visions feature for the Mushroom domain (cleric).

results.1-1: The creature uses all its movement to move in a random direction. To determine the direction, roll [[/r 1d8]] and assign a direction to each die face. The creature doesn‘t take an action this turn.
results.2-3: The creature doesn‘t move or take actions this turn, instead becoming entranced by the translucent, rococo patterns it sees covering every nearby surface.
results.6-7: The creature must succeed on its choice of either a Dexterity or Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC on each of its turns for the duration or fall prone.
results.8-9: The creature becomes confused, as per @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]{confusion}, hallucinating crawling swarms of insects on itself and others.
results.10-10: Suffering only mild hallucinations, the creature can act and move normally.

results.1-1: The desire to acquire more gold, more gems, and more wealth drives you to go further and dig deeper often without regard for the safety of yourself or others.
results.2-2: You saw something in the deep tunnels. Something terrible. You don’t want to go back.
results.3-3: Tight places terrify you and nothing will ever convince you to go down into the mines again.
results.4-4: Life is hard, and if you can’t keep up with me, you’ll get left behind.
results.5-5: You are completely reckless. You might as well have fun before death comes knocking at your door.
results.6-6: You are far too curious for your own good and that’s gotten you into trouble more often than you’d like to admit.

Prismatic Eyes Effects.name: Prismatic Eyes Effects
Prismatic Eyes Effects.description: Prismatic Eyes Effects table for the Prismatic Eyes spell for hoyrall spellcasters.

results.1-1: Red: The target takes [[/r 10d8]] fire damage (Successful Dexterity saving throw halves).
results.2-2: Orange: The target takes [[/r 10d8]] acid damage (Successful Dexterity saving throw halves).
results.3-3: Yellow: The target takes [[/r 10d8]] lightning damage (Successful Dexterity saving throw halves).
results.4-4: Green: The target is affected by caster’s @UUID[Compendium.underworld-races-and-classes.racial-features-urc.N8a7wDzJnybp4ETG]{Hoyrall Poison Blood}; saving throw is made at disadvantage.
results.5-5: Blue: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.w7eitkpD7QQTB6j0.JournalEntryPage.xnSV5hLJIMaTABXP]{Paralyzed} for the duration. This effect has no effect on undead. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success. The spell ends on the target.
results.6-6: Indigo: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw when you cast this spell or be affected by @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]{confusion}.
results.7-7: Violet: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw when you cast this spell or be affected by @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.04nMsTWkIFvkbXlY]{polymorph}.
results.8-8: White: The target takes [[/r 7d4]] force damage (no save) and is affected by @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8]{dispel magic}.

results.1-1: Working in the mines taught me one thing. There’s no place for slackers. Everyone has to do their part.
results.2-2: The solution to most problems is a strong arm, not tricks or magic.
results.3-3: Don’t hurry. Bring in the timbers and prop up the shaft before you dig that next tunnel.
results.4-4: Danger is all around us. And when there’s a cave in, sometimes we don’t have a choice but to let people die.
results.5-5: I’m a worker, not a thinker. I prefer to follow the orders of others who know how to lead.
results.6-6: The common people suffer so the rich have their luxuries. Maybe it’s time to change that.
results.7-7: I’ve spent so much time underground that I have forgotten the niceties of life.
results.8-8: I left a poor miner, but I’ll return with enough gold to buy every mine in the kingdom!

Hallucinogenic Visions (Circle of the Mu.name: Hallucinogenic Visions (Circle of the Mushroom)
Hallucinogenic Visions (Circle of the Mu.description: Hallucinogenic Visions table for the Truth of the Mushrooms feature for Circle of the Mushroom (druid).

results.1-1: You use all your movement to move in a random direction. To determine the direction, roll [[/r 1d8]] and assign a direction to each die face. You can‘t take any other action this turn.
results.2-3: You don‘t move or take actions this turn, instead becoming entranced by the translucent, rococo patterns you see covering every nearby surface.
results.6-7: You must succeed on your choice of either a Dexterity or Wisdom saving throw against your own spell save DC on each of your turns for the duration or fall prone.
results.8-9: You become confused, as per @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]{confusion}, hallucinating crawling swarms of insects on yourself and others.
results.10-10: Suffering only mild hallucinations, you can act and move normally.
